title: Display Driver Crash (TDR)
description: Fix 'Display driver stopped responding and has recovered' and TDR timeout errors.

steps.title: DDU Clean Reinstall
steps.instruction: Use 'Display Driver Uninstaller' (DDU) in Safe Mode to completely wipe old drivers before installing fresh ones.

steps.title: Adjust Power Target
steps.instruction: In NVIDIA Control Panel → Manage 3D Settings → Power management mode → Set to 'Prefer maximum performance'.

steps.title: Lower GPU Clock Speed
steps.instruction: If the factory overclock is unstable, use MSI Afterburner to reduce the Core Clock by -50MHz to improve stability.

steps.title: Check PCIe Cables
steps.instruction: Ensure all 8-pin/6-pin power connectors are fully clicked into the GPU. Loose power causes driver resets under load.

steps.title: Hardware Acceleration Scan
steps.instruction: Disable 'Hardware Acceleration' in Chrome/Discord/Teams if they are open during crashes to rule out app conflicts.
